windows.winget:
In Terminal, run:
winget install -e --id Git.Git
Then reopen your terminal.

git.message:
Version control won't be available.
The help page explains how to do version control with `git` and why it is useful:
https://recap-org.github.io/docs/version-control/

windows.winget:
In Terminal, run:
winget install -e --id RProject.R

macos.brew:
In Terminal, run:
brew install --cask r-app
macos.direct:
Download from:
https://cran.r-project.org
Then reopen your terminal.

R.message: R is required to run analyses and generate results in RECAP R projects.

windows.winget:
In Terminal, run:
winget install -e --id Posit.Quarto
Then reopen your terminal.

macos.brew:
In Terminal, run:
brew install quarto
macos.direct:
Download from:
https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/
Then reopen your terminal.

Quarto.message: Quarto is required to build reproducible reports and documents in RECAP projects.

windows.winget:
In Terminal, run:
quarto install tinytex

macos.brew:
In Terminal, run:
quarto install tinytex
macos.direct:
In Terminal, run:
quarto install tinytex

LaTeX.message: You won't be able to render Quarto reports as PDFs.

windows.winget:
In Terminal, run:
winget install -e --id ezwinports.make

make.message:
Automated builds with `make` will be unavailable.
The help page explains what `make` is and why it is useful:
https://recap-org.github.io/docs/building-with-make.html

renv.message:
Dependency management will be unavailable.
The help page explains what dependency management is and why it is useful:
https://recap-org.github.io/docs/dependency-management.html.

windows.winget:
In terminal, run:
winget install -e --id MiKTeX.MiKTeX
Also install Perl. In Terminal, run:
winget install -e --id StrawberryPerl.StrawberryPerl
Then open MikTeX to set it up. Make sure you install the latexmk package.
Then reopen your terminal.

macos.brew:
In Terminal, run:
brew install --cask mactex-no-gui
Then reopen your terminal.
macos.direct:
Download from:
https://www.tug.org/mactex/mactex-download.html
Then reopen your terminal.

LaTeX.message: You won't be able to compile Quarto reports nor final deliverables (article, appendix, presentation).
